seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.pageReservedSpace

target.mrk: derby.storage.pageReservedSpace

seg-source.mrk: derby.storage.pageReservedSpace

target.mrk: derby.storage.pageReservedSpace

seg-source.mrk: Reserving space on a page

target.mrk: Reserving space on a page

seg-source.mrk: Function

target.mrk: Function

trans-unit.source: Defines the percentage of space reserved for updates on an on-disk database page for tables only (not indexes); indicates the percentage of space to keep free on a page when inserting. Leaving reserved space on a page can minimize row overflow (and the associated performance hit) during updates. Once a page has been filled up to the reserved-space threshold, no new rows are allowed on the page. This reserved space is used only for rows that increase in size when updated, not for new inserts. Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE statement.

seg-source.mrk: Defines the percentage of space reserved for updates on an on-disk database page for tables only (not indexes); indicates the percentage of space to keep free on a page when inserting.
Leaving reserved space on a page can minimize row overflow (and the associated performance hit) during updates.
Once a page has been filled up to the reserved-space threshold, no new rows are allowed on the page.
This reserved space is used only for rows that increase in size when updated, not for new inserts.
Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE statement.

target.mrk: Defines the percentage of space reserved for updates on an on-disk database page for tables only (not indexes); indicates the percentage of space to keep free on a page when inserting.
Leaving reserved space on a page can minimize row overflow (and the associated performance hit) during updates.
Once a page has been filled up to the reserved-space threshold, no new rows are allowed on the page.
This reserved space is used only for rows that increase in size when updated, not for new inserts.
Set this property prior to issuing the CREATE TABLE statement.

trans-unit.source: Regardless of the value of derby.storage.pageReservedSpace, an empty page always accepts at least one row.

seg-source.mrk: Regardless of the value of derby.storage.pageReservedSpace, an empty page always accepts at least one row.

target.mrk: Regardless of the value of derby.storage.pageReservedSpace, an empty page always accepts at least one row.

seg-source.mrk: Valid conglomerates

target.mrk: Valid conglomerates

seg-source.mrk: Tables only.

target.mrk: Tables only.

seg-source.mrk: Default

target.mrk: Default

seg-source.mrk: Minimum value

target.mrk: Minimum value

trans-unit.source: The minimum value is 0% and the maximum is 100%. If you specify a value outside this range, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value of 20%.

seg-source.mrk: The minimum value is 0% and the maximum is 100%.
If you specify a value outside this range, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value of 20%.

target.mrk: The minimum value is 0% and the maximum is 100%.
If you specify a value outside this range, <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> uses the default value of 20%.

seg-source.mrk: Example

target.mrk: Example

trans-unit.source: -- modifying the default for the system derby.storage.pageReservedSpace=40 -- modifying the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageReservedSpace', '40')

seg-source.mrk: -- modifying the default for the system derby.storage.pageReservedSpace=40 -- modifying the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageReservedSpace', '40')

target.mrk: -- modifying the default for the system derby.storage.pageReservedSpace=40 -- modifying the default for the database CALL SYSCS_UTIL.SYSCS_SET_DATABASE_PROPERTY( 'derby.storage.pageReservedSpace', '40')

seg-source.mrk: Dynamic or static

target.mrk: Dynamic or static

trans-unit.source: This property is dynamic: if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately. For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

seg-source.mrk: This property is dynamic: if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.

target.mrk: This property is dynamic: if you change it while <ph conref="../conrefs.dita#prod/productshortname"></ph> is running, the change takes effect immediately.
For information about dynamic changes to properties, see <xref href="crefproperdynstat.dita#crefproperdynstat"/>.
